participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: resilient and caring, with a deep appreciation for family and perseverance.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a child. my aunt helped me escape when i was 18.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: friendly and humorous, always looking to lighten the mood and enjoy life with family.
participant_2.background: my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. my wife and kids are the best. i'm a plumber.
